data.name: Hands of Wisp
data.detailed_description:
Control the energy called Wisp in an Action RPG, surviving against various
unknown creatures while crossing maps and scenarios. Question, together with
Wisp, how generic and empty your mission can be and what this whole
universe means.

Inspired by Action RPG Games. Hands of Wisp is simple, but was created with
much affection. Advance through maps and scenarios defeating enemies who
try to stop you while you find your motivation. Throughout the game,
discover the weight of the empty and how this is important for all creatures
in this universe.

Features:
- Explore the sceneries of Cave, Snow, Water Distortion, Electric Zone and
one last dark scenario.

- Gradually be able to control elements that will help you to cross the
scenarios and can influence against certain enemies.

- Defeat the strongest creature of each scenario so that Wisp can summon
a new element.

- Explore the dialogues gradually to try to understand the entire Game
Universe and the motivation of the characters.

data.short_description: Control the energy called Wisp in an Action RPG, surviving againts various unknown creatures and crossing maps and scenarios. Question together with Wisp the how generic and empty your mission can be and what this whole universe means.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
